metadata.name: Silver Shuttlepass
metadata.description: A Silver pass gives you access to mint 2 total NFTs, one from each of the next 2 upcoming collections on the Settlers Roadmap: Surrealestates (land/homes) and Dealers (PFP). Mints will be free of charge (pay gas only) and have regular access (not early). The Silver pass includes other benefits as well which can be found at https://jointheppa.com
